title: Kurage no Shokudou
synopsis: One fateful day, Youtarou Misaki is rescued by a man named Arashi Mutou from drowning in the sea. After getting him to dry land, Arashi wakes Youtarou up and asks for his name. Youtarou's memories quickly surge back, but instead of telling Arashi his name, he decides to lie and act clueless about his past.
staff: [['Taniguchi, Hiromi', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Suzumura, Chika', ['Script']], ['Customi Z', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
